CustomField.description: Add a suffix to your user-generated fields in the format: "My Project Field [ProjectCustomField]". This indicates that they are additional fields created by the user, and which object they come from.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Add a suffix to your user-generated fields in the format: "My Project Field [ProjectCustomField]". This indicates that they are additional fields created by the user, and which object they come from.
CustomField.label: User-Generated Field Label Suffix
